body: {"sessionId":"test-session-123","userMessage":"I don't understand how to set up the equation for this problem","problemContext":{"problemID":"a01e792probsolve1","courseName":"OpenStax: Elementary Algebra","problemTitle":"Solve Number Problems","currentStep":{"id":"a01e792probsolve1a","title":"Set up the equation","body":"What equation represents the sum of three consecutive integers?","correctAnswer":["x + (x+1) + (x+2) = 24"],"answerType":"expression","knowledgeComponents":["linear_equations","consecutive_integers","algebraic_expressions"]}},"studentState":{"currentAnswer":"x + x + x = 24","isCorrect":false,"hintsUsed":[0,1],"skillMastery":{"linear_equations":0.73,"consecutive_integers":0.45,"algebraic_expressions":0.82},"attemptHistory":{"Solve Number Problems":{"Set up the equation":["x + x + x = 24","3x = 24"],"What is x?":["7","8"]}},"currentLessonMastery":[{"name":"Lesson 2.5 Solving One-Variable Equations","mastery":58}]},"conversationHistory":[]}
